mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is an article from The Whetstone, the quarterly magazine of the North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company. The cover date is Third Quarter, 1954. The article, titled "A Mutual Family", is about the Wood family and their connection to North Carolina Mutual Insurance Company. C. M. Wood worked for the company for 19 years. Various relatives also worked for the company. The article includes photographs of the family as well as their home, Blandome.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: A Mutual Family, The Whetstone, 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company
Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
Wood, Clarence M.
Wood family
